metadata.title: CVE-2022-2121 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
OFFIS DCMTK's (All versions prior to 3.6.7) has a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability while processing DICOM files, which may result in a denial-of-service condition.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2121` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.7-6
libdcmtk17 - 3.6.7-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.7-6').
